attributes.action:
Remove Royal Warrants from products which do not benefit the 
British people
attributes.additional_details: This seal of approval should only be given to British Owned Companies, who contribute a fair amount of tax to the UK Treasury, for British Made Products, which provide employment in Britain as well as meeting all the previous criteria
attributes.background: Royal Warrants can be issued to any companies who serve one of three Royal Households; in may cases these products are foreign owned, foreign made, by tax avoiding companies based in tax havens.

rejection.details: The awarding of Royal Warrants is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.
